title: Financial Information
description: Please provide details about your financial situation and housing status.

step1.title: Personal Information
step1.description: Please provide your personal details and contact information.

step2.title: Financial Information
step2.description: Please provide details about your financial situation and housing status.

step3.title: Application Details
step3.description: Please describe your situation and reason for applying.

employment_description: Your current employment and income details
benefits_description: Information about any government assistance you receive
financial_notice_text: All financial information will be verified. Please ensure accuracy as false information may result in application rejection and potential legal consequences.
fullName_help: Enter your full legal name as it appears on your official ID
nationalId_help: Your Emirates ID or National ID number (10 digits)
dateOfBirth_help: You must be at least 18 years old to apply
gender_help: Your gender as it appears on official documents
email_help: We'll use this email to contact you about your application
city_help: The city where you currently reside
numberOfDependents_help: Children or family members you financially support
occupation_placeholder: Enter your job title or profession
occupation_help: Your current job title or type of business
employer_help: The company or organization you work for
monthlyIncome_help: Your total monthly income from all sources
totalSavings_help: Your current savings and bank deposits
totalDebt_help: Your current total debt including loans and credit cards
receivingBenefits_help: Are you currently receiving any form of government assistance?
benefitTypes_help: Select all types of government benefits you currently receive
previouslyApplied_help: Have you applied for social support from this program before?
financialSituation_placeholder: Describe your current financial situation in detail...
financialSituation_help: Please describe your financial challenges and circumstances that led you to apply for support. Include details about income loss, unexpected expenses, or other financial hardships.
employmentCircumstances_help: Please explain your current employment situation, including any recent job loss, reduced hours, inability to work, or other employment-related challenges.
reasonForApplying_placeholder: Explain why you are applying for social support...
reasonForApplying_help: Please explain specifically what type of support you need and how it will help improve your situation.
additionalComments_placeholder: Any additional information you'd like to share...
additionalComments_help: Optional: Any other relevant information that might help us understand your situation better.
agreeToTerms: I agree to the terms and conditions
agreeToTerms_help: You must agree to the terms and conditions to submit your application
consentToDataProcessing_help: You must consent to data processing for your application to be reviewed
allowContactForClarification_help: Can we contact you if we need clarification on your application?
submission_success_message: Your application has been submitted with ID: {{applicationId}}

next_steps_items.review_application: We will review your application within 2 business days
next_steps_items.email_updates: You will receive email updates on your application status
next_steps_items.keep_application_id: Keep your application ID for future reference

application_reference_note: Please save your application ID for future reference
confirmation_email_sent: A confirmation email has been sent to your registered email address.
notice_text: Please ensure all information is accurate and matches your official documents. This information will be used for verification purposes.
final_notice_text: Your application will be reviewed by our support team. We may contact you if additional information is needed. Processing typically takes 5-10 business days.

ai_modal_descriptions.financialSituation: Help us understand your current financial circumstances and challenges you're facing.
ai_modal_descriptions.employmentCircumstances: Share details about your work situation, job search, or employment challenges.
ai_modal_descriptions.reasonForApplying: Tell us specifically what kind of support you need and why you're applying.
